title: Send Messages
content: I am unable to send or reply to messages. My top bar with those commands vanishes when I choose reply or compose. Help
creator: gdhutch

title: thunderbird snaps broke all content-handling applications
content:
When I upgraded my ubuntu system from 22.04 to 24.04, I was compelled to accept the conversion of thunderbird to snaps. Now none of the applications -- like http handler -- will run because snap maps them all to something under /run/usr/... AND THEY WON'T RUN FROM THERE I cannot even use Help to make a donation! I need to be able to get to vivaldi, firefox, libreoffice and others. Every time I enter one in the application box, the snapper remaps to /run/user/... I try to find that location and it's not there -- of course it won't run! -- and the application won't work. screenshots attached

Tell me how to roll back from v128.3.1esr to a version without snaps -- without losing 10 years worth of email!
creator: kmcaywood

title: Thunderbird download not accessible
content: I donated before downloading and now every iteration of "download" takes me to the donation screen and I cannot see how to get past it. (Once is enough:-)
creator: richardod50

title: mail bianche post archiviazione.
content: Buongiorno, archiviando le mail su di un profilo locale in pop3 alcune mail dopo l'archiviazione non vengono più visualizzate, vengono visualizzati al loro posto un rigo bianco con l'ultim data di riparazione cartella. a cosa può essere dovuto? E soprattutto come faccio a recuperare le mail? grazie p.s. ho già provato a compattare e recuperare la cartella, senza però alcun risultato.
creator: m.marchi1

content: ik ontvang nu voor de 2e keer paar emailberichten met goede weergave van de afzender maar de inhoud alleen deze tekst : ------=_NextPart_000_0003_01D71062.B8078920-- Ik wil graag weten hoe dit ontstaat. H.Groen

title: Mails messed up.
content:
Mails get messed up. All new emails show the same (wrong) attachment file. While mails are not readable. Has happened occasionaly during last month on different synced computers. Using Thunderbird 128.3.1esr version.

Restart computer, restart thunderbird, thoubleshoot mode on, non of them help. Im really stuck as I cant properly read my mails.

Adding to slides where you can see how different mails pop up.

While tring to do fixes I also lost my ability to see Todays Pane as google calender. Cantget it back.

Thanks in advance!

Regards,

Urmo
creator: urmo

title: Calendar
content:
Hello,

I use Thunderbird v. 128.3.1esr (64bit) on Ubuntu 24.04, but in calendar from version 128 i cannot drag and drop events in month or "moreweek" view. In week view everything works. I need to easily move events by several weeks and months. Can you help me?

Thank You.

Tomas
creator: tomas40
